arts.ttl: Ivan Juric after Atalanta’s 4-0 loss to PSG: “Difference in quality is enormous”
arts.sum: Serie A side Atalanta suffered a heavy 4-0 loss to Paris Saint-Germain yesterday and it coud have been worse. Despite that, manager Ivan Juric remains optimistic about the side…

arts.ttl: PSG vs Atalanta – Luis Enrique at the press conference: Performance, Neves, Mayulu and Marquinhos
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain won 4-0 against Atalanta on Wednesday at the Parc des Princes, in the first matchday of the 2025-2026 Champions League. After this victory, Paris Saint-Germain coach Luis Enrique spoke at the press conference. Enrique: “It was difficult, but we deserved the victory.” Are you at the same level as last season? “That’s not […]

arts.ttl: PSG vs Atalanta – Luis Enrique’s words on performance, Neves and Barcola
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain won 4-0 against Atalanta this Wednesday at the Parc des Princes in Matchday 1 of the 2025-2026 Champions League. After this victory, Parisian coach Luis Enrique spoke to Canal+. Luis Enrique: “It was difficult, we had to prepare well for the match.” Did you enjoy the evening from both the top and the […]

arts.ttl: PSG vs Atalanta – Chevalier’s truths about his special role
arts.sum: Lucas Chevalier, 23-year-old Paris Saint-Germain goalkeeper, spoke to Canal+ after the 4-0 victory over Atalanta this Wednesday at the Parc des Princes as part of Matchday 1 of the 2025-2026 Champions League. He mainly discussed his rather unusual mission in Paris. Chevalier: “There’s always work to do.” Weren’t you too bored? A little more so […]

arts.ttl: PSG vs Atalanta – Kvaratskhelia talks about his satisfaction and his goal after the victory
arts.sum: This Wednesday evening at the Parc des Princes, Paris Saint-Germain kicked off their new European campaign by facing Atalanta Bergamo on the first day of the group stages. Paris won resoundingly with a resounding 4-0. Khvicha Kvaratskhelia, Rouge et Bleu striker and tonight’s scorer, spoke to Cana+ to reflect on the victory: Kvaratskhelia: “I think […]

arts.ttl: PSG vs Atalanta – Nuno Mendes savors while remaining humble
arts.sum: Nuno Mendes, 23-year-old Paris Saint-Germain left-back, spoke to Canal+ after the 4-0 victory over Atalanta this Wednesday at the Parc des Princes as part of Matchday 1 of the 2025-2026 Champions League. He discussed the progress made since September 2024. Mendes: “We’re on the right track.” The first match last year was very difficult. PSG […]

arts.ttl: Holders PSG outclass Atalanta 4-0 in UCL opener
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain made a winning start in defence of their Champions League title as they outclassed Atalanta in an impressive 4-0 win at Parc des Princes.

arts.ttl: PSG copes without star forwards and routs Atalanta 4-0 in Champions League
arts.sum: It was on display once again as central defender Marquinhos, winger Khvicha Kvaratskhelia, left back Nuno Mendes and substitute Gonçalo Ramos all scored at Parc des Princes. Mayulu came off shortly after Mendes had made it 3-0 in the 51st minute after combining with Barcola down the left and showing excellent close control before firing a shot inside the post.

arts.ttl: PSG vs Atalanta – The Parisians’ ratings: a Kvaratskhelia of great evenings
arts.sum: This Wednesday, on Matchday 1 of the 2025-2026 Champions League, Paris Saint-Germain faced Atalanta at the Parc des Princes. After a match in which the Red and Blue largely dominated, they won 4-0 (see video recap). Here are our ratings for the Parisians. Goalkeeper – Lucas Chevalier (6) – A first half played like a […]

arts.ttl: Luis Enrique: ‘Atalanta press and cause problems, but PSG had to start strong’
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain coach Luis Enrique insists the 4-0 Champions League victory over Atalanta was not...
